resources.string: Notification log - Double tap to add

SmartNotifire reads notifications and speaks them aloud based on your rules.
 To work, it needs Android’s “Notification access” permission.

 SmartNotifire uses only the information needed to identify notifications and the notification title.
 It does not save or send other notification content.

 Tapping OK will open the system settings screen.
 Please find SmartNotifire in the list and enable notification access.
 You may also choose not to enable this permission.
 In that case, you can select Exit App to close the application.
Are you sure you want to delete this rule?
The same search title is already set for the same app.
This notification is for notification confirmation purposes.

This app provides voice guidance to help you identify what each notification sound refers to,
 based on:
 1. Conditions specified by the user
 2. Voice guidance messages registered by the user.

The notifications handled by this app are limited to those displayed when you tap the Add button.
 While this app monitors and retrieves notifications shown on your device, it cannot handle all notifications due to Android system limitations and the requirements of Google’s privacy policies.
